short_description:
A moddable 2D fighter for the Sega Dreamcast video game console. It allows users without programming experience to create new characters and games with relative ease. 1000 characters are nowhere near enough to describe the awesomeness of this engine, so make sure to check out the Web Site (hosted here at Source Forge) for more info. 


Some quick technical specs: 

 - 60 frames per second (Dreamcast standard: 30fps) 
 - Screen Resolution: 640x480 (Dreamcast standard: 320x240) 
 - Max Character resolution: 256x256 (DC standard: ???) 
 - Frames usable: ~1000 for both characters 
 - Completely modifiable 
 - Support for paletted and/or TrueColor sprites 
 - Easy to pick up and play, easy to mod for, but hard to master (both!) 
 - CD quality audio 
 - Optimized for the Sega Dreamcast
